execute-shortcut.description: Skips an skippable ad when Alt+S is pressed

execute-shortcut-p1.description: Sets the playback speed to 1x(Normal) when Alt+P+0 is pressed

execute-shortcut-p125.description: Sets the playback speed to 1.25x when Alt+P+1 is pressed

execute-shortcut-p15.description: Sets the playback speed to 1.5x when Alt+P+2 is pressed
